ShapesTests.summary: The ShapesTest class. Contains tests for methods of all the types of geometrical shapes.

GetEqualShapesNot.summary: ests if GetEqualShapes() method of ShapeFactory class returns an empty collection provided that the collection under examination does not contain equal shapes.
